name: Instagram Worthy Travel Experience (Promo Period)
description: Get to know Jakarta and its stories. From the bustling metropolis and the quiet corners that kept history. I will introduce you to the Old City of Jakarta and the major spotlights around the city centre. Plus, I will be YOUR PERSONAL VACATION PHOTOGRAPHER during the trip. This time around, each one of YOU will be in the picture to tell the story. And, up until Sept 2015, I will give extra photo book printed for you FOR FREE with up to 30 pages (Value @USD35). Enjoy!
